#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <string.h>
#include <math.h>
#include <algorithm>
#include <vector>
#include <map>
#include <set>
#include <queue>
#include <stack>
#include <limits.h>
using namespace std;
bool comp(int a,int b)
{
    return (a>b);
}
int gcd(int a,int b)
{
    if(b==0)
        return a;
    else
        return gcd(b,a%b);
}
int main(void) {
    int t;
    long long int n,k;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    long long int a[]={0LL,9LL,189LL,2889LL,38889LL,488889LL,5888889LL,68888889LL,788888889LL,8888888889LL,98888888889LL,1088888888889LL,11888888888889LL,128888888888889LL,1388888888888889LL,14888888888888889LL};
    long long int b[]={0LL,9LL,99LL,999LL,9999LL,99999LL,999999LL,9999999LL,99999999LL,999999999LL,9999999999LL,99999999999LL,999999999999LL,9999999999999LL,99999999999999LL,999999999999999LL,9999999999999999LL};
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%lld %lld",&n,&k);
        long long int r,c,i;
        for(i=1;i<=16;++i)
        {
            if(a[i]>k)
                break;
        }
        r=b[i]-((a[i]-k)/i);
        c=(a[i]-k)%i;
        while(c)
        {
            r/=10LL;
            c--;
        }
        printf("%lld\n",r%10);
    }
	return 0;
}
